Title: Establishes a home heating tax credit; repealer
Summary: Establishes a home heating tax credit for qualified taxpayers with an income of $125,000 or less for single filers, or with a combined income of $250,000 or less for joint filers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a home heating tax credit; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
